channel.title: Need some advice
channel.description: Is there a way for me to mine all this without losing it to the lava? Already loss 2 pieces :( [img]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/8925/67037104.png[/img]

item.title: Need some advice
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:30, topic:385083”]yea man fox news, love how people still think im obsessed with it

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=480849.msg3521948#msg3521948 date=1299460931]

Way to make this topic go further than it ever needed to go.

Who the fuck cares its a discussion

Theres a reason most people grow out of legos when theyre 7 though
[/quote] you grew out of legos D:…
(is 18 still loves his legos)
O-o… the poeple that stop playing with there legos… is when there imagination ends.

No I just took up modeling

And honestly how much different are the two? Sure, yours has more potential for creation, but it’s still the same idea.

No one ever sold a title or god paid building anything in minecraft ;)[/quote]
Actually, people do sell minecraft maps

Read full topic

item.title: Need some advice
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:30, topic:385083”]yea man fox news, love how people still think im obsessed with it

[quote author=reyx7 link=topic=480849.msg3521948#msg3521948 date=1299460931]

Way to make this topic go further than it ever needed to go.

Who the fuck cares its a discussion

Theres a reason most people grow out of legos when theyre 7 though
[/quote] you grew out of legos D:…
(is 18 still loves his legos)
O-o… the poeple that stop playing with there legos… is when there imagination ends.

No I just took up modeling

And honestly how much different are the two? Sure, yours has more potential for creation, but it’s still the same idea.

No one ever sold a title or god paid building anything in minecraft ;)[/quote]
That made what sense at all? I’ll break this up a bit, and see if anybody can make something.

“No one ever sold a title”
“No one ever sold a god” (paid building?)
“No one sold a title in minecraft”
“No one ever sold a god paid building in minecraft”
“No one ever sold anything in minecraft”

Well, that is really all the “make sence” pieces I can grab out of that sentence for the moment, I have more, but those would not apply very well.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some advice
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:21, topic:385083”][quote author=(Anthony) link=topic=480849.msg3521878#msg3521878 date=1299457025]

[quote author=Frell link=topic=480849.msg3521872#msg3521872 date=1299456599]
Yes you can. Was just curious why people like minecraft, I got into and loved it for about 8 hours and now I think its the most retarded thing ever
[/quote]It’s fun till you realize that you’re doing the same thing over and over again because there is nothing to do but mine shit and build.
[/quote]But building is the fun part, even if it is repetitive. It’s the thrill of creAtioN![/quote]

This. To me, building is the fun part. People say I’m great at building cities and making them look awesome.

Read full topic
